fig.basic
Class OptionsParser

java.lang.Object
  fig.basic.OptionsParser

public class OptionsParser
extends Object

Due to historical reasons, all the member functions are prefixed with do, and all the static functions (apply to the global theParser instance) are not. 3/1/2007: static methods register and parse have been deprecated. Please create an instance and use the doRegister and doParse counterparts.
